snippet: Rafael Nadal held off Tomas Berdych, 6-4, 1-6, 6-3, to finish the round robin at 3-0 and win his group at the ATP World Tour Finals in London.
abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Tomas Berdych to win his group at the ATP Tour Finals in London.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal held off Tomas Berdych, 6-4, 1-6, 6-3, to finish the round robin at 3-0 and win his group at the ATP World Tour Finals in London.
